Description: As it takes more than one person to build a village, we support and reshare (RS) any other events that we believe are relevant. Here is one. Please register directly on the event page.Human activity is irreversibly changing our planet, especially our climate. The voracious demand for fossil fuels and natural resources has led us to an ecological breaking point, even after decades of climate action. How do we reverse this trend? The Growth vs. Climate Conference in Barcelona will gather leading scientists, thinkers, policymakers, activists and journalists to discuss the most pressing environmental issues of our time. The 3-day event will feature keynote speakers, academic papers on specific and cross-cutting themes, policy debates, and co-creation workshops organized across five societal challenges: Oceans, Land, Cities, Consumption and Policies.
